'''"Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt"''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [["Pile 'Em Up"]] with [[Diluc]]. The recipe for "Pile 'Em Up" is obtainable from [[Good Hunter]] for 5,000 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 40.

"Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt" increases the party's critical rate by '''20'''%  and critical damage by '''20'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
*To celebrate Diluc's [[birthday]], the [[Teyvat Food Notes]] published a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/15367 real-life recipe] for "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt." In it, Diluc tells the Traveler that he chose the name for this dish on a whim, though it is apparent that he is simply hiding his real reason.
* The following birthday mails included "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt":
** [[Birthday/Diluc#Have you been well?|Diluc's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (1 "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt")
** [[Birthday/Diluc#Dinner...|Diluc's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (1 "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt")
